tables.name: manga_series
tables.sql: CREATE TABLE manga_series (mangaseriesid INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, subseriesid INT NOT NULL REFERENCES subseries(subseriesid), volumes INT);

tables.name: manga_publishinginfo
tables.sql: CREATE TABLE manga_publishinginfo (publishid INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, mangaseriesied INT NOT NULL REFERENCES manga_series(mangaseriesid), publisher INT REFERENCES manga_company(mangacompanyid), volumenumber INT NOT NULL, volumetitle TEXT, releasedate DATETIME);

tables.name: manga_library
tables.sql: CREATE TABLE manga_library(libraryid INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, mangaseries INT NOT NULL REFERENCES manga_series(rowid), catrank INT, own INT, read INT)

tables.name: manga_company
tables.sql: CREATE TABLE manga_company (mangacompanyid INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, company INT NOT NULL REFERENCES company(companyid), notes TEXT)

tables.name: genrelist_mangaseries
tables.sql: CREATE TABLE genrelist_mangaseries (genrelistid INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, genreid INT NOT NULL REFERENCES genres(genreid), mangaseriesid INT NOT NULL REFERENCES mangaseries(mangaseriesid), UNIQUE (genreid,mangaseriesid) ON CONFLICT IGNORE);

tables.name: images_manga
tables.sql: CREATE TABLE images_manga (imageid INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, mangaseriesid INT NOT NULL REFERENCES mangaseries(mangaseriesid),url TEXT NOT NULL, imagetype TEXT, UNIQUE (mangaseriesid,url) ON CONFLICT REPLACE);
